If my view is blocked, how can

I paint a picture?

Oh, so sorry!

Wow!

You really paint well! Everything is so lifelike and animated.

This is my job. I have to paint well

or I'll starve.

Now that I think

about it, you’re

the painter Augustus

Earle, aren’t you?

That’s right.

Ha ha,

no wonder.

I am the naturalist Charles Darwin.

Pleased

to meet you.

I look forward

to seeing

you around.

58
